original_text: Now a man named Lazarus was sick. He was from Bethany, the village of Mary and her sister Martha.
korean_text: 어떤 병자가 있으니 이는 마리아와 그 자매 마르다의 마을 베다니에 사는 나사로라

sentences.original_text: Now a man named Lazarus was sick
the village of Mary and her sister Martha
sentences.korean_translation: 마리아와 그의 여동생 마르다가 사는 마을이었다
